metadata.title: CVE-2024-8654 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: MongoDB Server may access non-initialized region of memory leading tounexpected behaviour when zero arguments are called in internal aggregationstage. This issue affected MongoDB Server v6.0 version 6.0.3.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
